scripts.test:ts: NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" pwd && yarn generate edgeql-js && yarn generate queries --file && yarn generate interfaces && jest --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test:non_ts: yarn test:esm && yarn test:cjs && yarn test:mts && yarn test:deno
scripts.test:esm: yarn generate queries --target esm --file esm/queries && yarn generate edgeql-js --target esm --output-dir esm/edgeql-js && cd esm && node test.js
scripts.test:cjs: yarn generate queries --target cjs --file cjs/queries && yarn generate edgeql-js --target cjs --output-dir cjs/edgeql-js && cd cjs && node test.js
scripts.test:mts: yarn generate queries --target mts --file mts/queries && yarn generate edgeql-js --target mts --output-dir mts/edgeql-js && cd mts && yarn build && node dist/test.js
scripts.test:deno: cd deno && deno task edgeql-js && deno task queries && deno task play
